Package dk.anaha.easykv.client

Class EasyKVZK

java.lang.Object
dk.anaha.easykv.client.EasyKVZK
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class EasyKVZK
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
EasyKVZK is a EasyKeyValue client which method names that resemble Apache ZooKeeper. Should you be familiar with that product then this will come easy to you.

However if you are are not familiar with that product then have a look at EasyKVJava.java which should provide easier adoption. 

 try (EasyKVZK kvs = new EasyKVZK(tcpPort)){
     kvs.connect();
     // ... your code
 }

Author:
Azri Rosborg
